oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bluebird 78's - tape 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 3 of recordings of Bluebird 78 discs, featuring The Four Aces (performers), Happy Fats and his Rayne-Bo Ramblers (performers), Thibodeaux Boys (performers), Riverside Rambler (performers), and Jean Fuselier (performer), performing Creole tunes from the 1930's.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: The Four Aces; Happy Fats and his Rayne-Bo Ramblers; Thibodeaux Boys; Riverside Ramblers; Jean Fuselier
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Aces Breakdown (The Four Aces) -- Second Street Blues (The Four Aces) -- Ma Belle Mellina (Happy Fats and his Rayne-Bo Ramblers) -- Se Mallereaux (Happy Fats and his Rayne-Bo Ramblers) -- La Moulin Casay (Thibodeaux Boys) -- De Suel Payce Blues (Thibodeaux Boys) -- Mon Cour Mme Fais Ci Mal (Riverside Ramblers) -- Two Step De La Tell (Jean Fuselier) -- La Valse Du La Compaign (Jean Fuselier) -- Tu Pen Pas Ma Retter De Revere (Thibodeaux Boys)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Four Aces (Cajun Group); Happy Fats; Rayne-Bo Ramblers; Thibodeaux Boys; Riverside Ramblers;
